summary: This document is a letter from Jeffrey Epstein to Deutsche Bank authorizing Harry Beller to have signing authority on the Neptune LLC account. It indicates Epstein's management of financial matters related to his business interests.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the author of the letter, granting signing authority to Harry Beller for the Neptune LLC account.

persons.name: Harry Beller
persons.context: Harry Beller is mentioned as the individual who is being granted signing authority on the Neptune LLC account by Jeffrey Epstein.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein authorizes Harry Beller to act on behalf of Neptune LLC, indicating a professional relationship.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 27th Fl, New York, NY 10154
keyFacts: The document is a letter dated September 30, 2013.
Jeffrey Epstein authorizes Harry Beller to have signing authority on the Neptune LLC account.
The letter is addressed to Amanda Kirby at Deutsche Bank.
